    • onActionLogIn

      void onActionLogIn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Validates username and password for log in to application. Display language and time varies based on system locale. Within this method are two Lambda functions used to streamline the logging of either a successful login in, or a failed login, to the login_activity.txt file. The two Lambda Functions are goodLog() and badLog()
      Parameters:
      event - login
      Throws:
      IOException
